Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Profil du candidat


You are a young graduate and have demonstrated a first successful experience as a Data Engineer with a background in PySpark, AWS, DataOps, and/or DevOps.
You have strong programming skills in languages such as Python and SQL.
You have a previous experience with data modeling, ETL development, and data warehousing.
You show a strong interest for the commodities trading or energy sectors.
You are an excellent problem-solver and you pay attention to detail.
You have strong communication skills and the ability to work in a team environment.



Activit√©s

Are you a Data Engineer with a passion for innovation and problem-solving? We are looking for a talented individual with expertise in Databricks, AWS, DataOps and/or DevOps to join our team and help us harness the power of data.

Key Responsibilities:


Design and implement complex data solutions using Databricks and AWS.
Develop and maintain scalable and reliable data pipelines.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality data solutions.
Implement DataOps and DevOps best practices to improve the efficiency and quality of data delivery.
Monitor and optimize data systems to ensure optimal performance.



What We Offer:


A dynamic and challenging work environment with opportunities for growth and development.
A collaborative team that values innovation and creativity.
A commitment to diversity and inclusion in the workplace.



If you are a Data Engineer looking for an exciting new challenge and the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and take the next step in your career with us!

Contexte et environnement

Role Overview: As a Data Engineer, you will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining our data infrastructure. You will work closely with our team to design, build, and optimize data pipelines, ensuring the highest quality of data availability and accuracy.

Title: Data Engineer (100% Remote - Switzerland)
Description:
About The Job

At Tether, we're committed to making advanced AI technologies more accessible. Thanks to its investment in AI infrastructure, starting from Northern Data, Tether is now in a prime position to tackle ambitious AI projects. Our goal is to build the next generation of AI models, leading innovation in AI, through an accessible, transparent and privacy preserving approach.The role involves building AI solutions across the spectrum from large-scale models designed for advanced applications to smaller, highly performant models tailored for efficiency on edge devices such as mobile phones and laptops.Our dynamic team operates entirely remotely, uniting talent from every corner of the globe. Our journey has been marked by rapid growth and efficient operations, firmly establishing us as pioneers within the industry. Join us in building AI models and solutions that not only compete with but exceed the capabilities of current leaders, driving both technological advancement and broad accessibility.

What You'll Do:


Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable Python code to construct data pipelines.
Work closely with data scientists and analysts to understand and fulfill their data requirements.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of data pipelines.
Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems.
Maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.
Develop and implement data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and data quality.
Collaborate with teams to integrate systems.
4+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role.
Strong programming skills in Python.
Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc.
Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases.
Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.
Strong project management and organizational skills.
Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.


Preferred Qualifications:


Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field.
Experience with machine learning algorithms and libraries.
Familiarity with data visualization tools.

Title: Senior Business Intelligence Consultant
Company: Berkeley Square - Talent Specialists in IT & Engineering
Description:
Job Title: Senior Business Intelligence Consultant

Location: Zurich/Remote




At Berkeley Square, we are dedicated to connecting top talent with leading organizations. As a recruitment agency, we specialize in identifying and placing exceptional candidates for a diverse range of roles.




About the Role: As a Business Intelligence Consultant, you will be instrumental in helping our client achieve their data-driven goals. You will collaborate closely with the client to understand their needs and deliver tailored BI solutions that drive strategic decision-making. This role requires a mix of technical expertise and business insight.




Responsibilities:

Collaborate with clients to gather and analyze business requirements.
Design and develop BI solutions, including reports, dashboards, and data visualizations.
Implement and configure BI tools and platforms such as Power BI, Tableau, or similar.
Develop and maintain ETL processes to integrate and transform data from various sources.
Perform data analysis to uncover trends, patterns, and insights that support business objectives.
Provide recommendations and best practices for data management and BI strategies.
Train and support clients in the use of BI tools and solutions.
Monitor and optimize BI performance to ensure efficiency and reliability.




Qualifications:

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Data Science, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in Business Intelligence, Data Analysis, or a similar role.
Proficiency with BI tools such as Power BI, Tableau, or QlikView.
Strong experience in SQL and data modeling.
Knowledge of ETL processes and data warehousing concepts.




Preferred Skills:

Experience with data science techniques and machine learning.
Familiarity with cloud-based BI platforms (e.g., Azure, AWS).
Relevant certifications in BI tools or data analysis.
Fluent in German and English.




Pay range and compensation package: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunities for professional growth and development. A supportive and collaborative work environment. Remote work option. Access to the latest BI tools and technologies.




If you are a skilled Business Intelligence Consultant interested in working with a forward-thinking company, we would love to hear from you.

Title: Business Insights and Analytics Intern
Description:
To support our team in Switzerland we are looking for a Business Insights and Analytics Intern.




Are you ready to make a meaningful impact on patients' lives while gaining invaluable experience in business analytics? Novocure is seeking a dynamic and analytical individual to join our team as a Business Insights and Analytics Intern. This part-time position (50-70% time commitment) reports to the Associate Director of Business Insights and Analytics and involves collaborating with our international team to support and optimize our business reporting processes.




Your responsibilities:

Develop, prepare, and optimize monthly business excellence reporting and associated analytics across international markets.
Work closely with the Senior Specialist and Associate Director to analyze and interpret data, providing actionable insights to country General Managers.
Ensure data accuracy and reliability through robust data validation processes.
Analyze internal datasets to identify trends, patterns, and business implications.
Develop new dashboards and alerts within our International Business Operations reporting framework.
Gather feedback from various business units to address evolving needs and translate them into actionable insights.




Your profile:

Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Business, Data Analytics, a Scientific field, or a related discipline with a strong analytical component.
Previous experience in data analysis through internships, academic projects, or relevant work.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word); experience with Power BI, SQL, or other data analysis tools is desirable but not essential.
Commitment to accuracy in all outputs.
Interest in business strategy, healthcare, and the implications of analytics on business operations.
Ability to convey complex information clearly and concisely in English.
Collaborative mindset and willingness to work closely with the Business Analytics team and other stakeholders.
Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and meet deadlines.




About us:

Novocure is a global publicly-traded commercial-stage oncology company developing a profoundly different cancer treatment therapy called tumor treating fields (TTFields) for patients with solid tumors. TTFields therapy is a non-invasive, novel, antimitotic treatment modality which utilizes proprietary technology attempting to slow or reverse tumor progression by inducing tumor cell death. Novocure's commercialized product, Optune, is approved for the treatment of adult patients with glioblastoma (GBM) in the USA, Europe and Israel. Novocure has ongoing or completed clinical trials and is further expanding its efforts into several other solid tumor indications - non-small cell lung cancer, pancreatic cancer and other types of solid cancers.




We are looking forward to receive your application through our ApplicantPortal. Please find more information about Novocure and our therapy on our website www.novocure.com or by consulting our patient testimonial videos.

Title: Analytics & Insights - Paid Internship (m/f/x)
Description:
Job Location

Petit-Lancy

Job Description

Position: Analytics & Insights - Paid Internship (m/f/x)

Location: Geneva

Do you have passion to influence business strategy, product design, commercial vision, media landscape? Passion to drive the change, through deep consumer understanding and front-edge advanced analytics? And finally, are you available for a 6-months internship?

Then, this role is perfect for you!

In Analytics & Insights (A&I), we use our boundless curiosity to discover what consumers want, why they want it & how we can we influence them, through immersive exploration and data analytics.

We uncover unexpected insights and innovate the way P&G runs business.

A career in A&I will build your ability to influence and think strategically, across a breadth of experiences on multiple P&G business.

Your role as an Analytics & Insights Intern :


You will act as a business strategy consultant, guiding decisions of P&G management in several business domains (consumer, costumer, digital, ‚Ä¶);
You will be part of a multi-functional business team, working closely with Marketing, Finance, Sales, R&D and others, constantly exploring new opportunities for business growth;
You will combine analytical expertise and deep consumer understanding, to anticipate opportunities and answer critical business questions;
You will grow your skills day-in, day-out, improving your mastery in data analytics as well as immersive in-depth research. You will have the opportunity to explore new ways to learn and to connect with internal & external guides worldwide.


What we offer:


Responsibilities as of Day 1 ‚Äì You will be given concrete projects and feel the ownership for them from the beginning
Continuous Growth through working on real business challenges and mentoring‚Äì you will work with a team and receive both formal training as well as day-to-day mentoring from your manager, ensuring your skillset will grown day in-day out.
Opportunity to work in a dynamic and respectful work environment ‚Äì We live our Purpose, Values, and Principles daily. We value every individual and encourage initiatives promoting agility and work/life balance.


Job Qualifications

What we are looking for:

Masters Students with:


Strong analytical skills and Integrative thinking
Proven leadership and teamwork skills, with a ‚Äúcan-do‚Äù approach and an unusual skew to innovate
Ability to play a key role and influence across levels and functions.
Boundless curiosity and un-sane passion to generate results
Data Analytics background a plus


Additional expertise/certifications on the following areas will be valued but not required:


Work experience or certification in Market Research Techniques (Quantitative or Qualitative methods)
Work experience or certification in Visualization, Data transformation tools and/or programming (Tableau, Spotfire, PowerBI , JMP, SQL, R or Python, Alteryx, KNIME, RapidMiner)


WHO WE ARE:

P&G is one of the world‚Äôs largest consumer goods companies and home to iconic, loved and trusted brands, such as Dash¬Æ, Gillette¬Æ, Pantene¬Æ, Oral-B¬Æ, Swiffer¬Æ, Head & Shoulders¬Æ, Braun¬Æ, Fairy¬Æ.

For over 180 years, Procter & Gamble has grown in the market and changed the way business is done, thanks to Talents. We value leadership as well as mastery and offer fulfilling career opportunities that make us an unbeatable force in our industry.

At P&G #weseeequal

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. At P&G we strive to build a culture where everyone feels welcome, included, and able to bring their full selves to work.

We ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process. Please click here if you require an accommodation during the application process. Please make sure to wait to hear back from us regarding your accommodation before proceeding with the online assessment, we thank you in advance for your patience.

Due to legal restrictions, immigration sponsorship is available only for EU/EFTA nationalities. All candidates with nonEU/EFTA nationalities are encouraged to check out opportunities in countries where they can obtain a work permit.

Title: Data Engineer Intern (Python)
Description:
Garda Capital Partners (Garda) is a multi-billion dollar alternative investment firm with over 20 years of experience deploying relative value strategies across fixed income markets for institutional investors. Garda has offices in Wayzata, New York City, West Palm Beach, Geneva, Zug, Copenhagen, Singapore, and Scottsdale.

Garda is looking to hire a Data Engineer Intern (Python) to be a part of our Inflation Trading Team, in 2025 for a 6-month internship in Zug, Switzerland. This is an exciting position offering opportunities to gain exposure to software development and portfolio management practices at a global hedge fund.

Position Responsibilities


Aid in the development of new lines of business solutions using Python, and SQL
Support senior investment staff by owning data extraction and ingestion from websites, transformation, tooling and automation
Provide support for in-house and 3rd party applications


Qualifications & Desired Skills


Pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or Quantitative Finance
Experience with the Python ecosystem of common libraries and working knowledge of at least one statically typed language
Good grasp of computer science fundamentals (e.g. data structures, algorithms, operating systems etc.)
Familiarity with object-oriented programming
Strong problem-solving skills and commitment to high standards for code
Interest or prior experience in the financial trading industry (particularly in fixed income) a plus
Ability to work effectively in a high-energy, time-sensitive team environment
Detail-oriented with strong verbal and written communication skills

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
LocationBinningen, Basel-Landschaft, SwitzerlandBusiness SectorAIContact emailJob ref23614Published8 days ago

We are seeking an experienced Data Analyst with expertise in Veeva CRM and Power BI to join one of our clients in Biotech. This role is crucial in supporting commercial excellence through effective data integration, insightful visualizations, and upskilling internal teams on optimizing the use of Veeva CRM. You will collaborate closely with marketing, sales, IT, and executive teams to drive impactful business decisions.

Key Responsibilities


Data Integration: Lead the integration of commercial and CRM data into Veeva CRM, ensuring accurate and seamless data flow.
Upskilling Teams: Provide informal training and support to internal teams on maximizing the use of Veeva CRM software.
Power BI Visualization: Analyze complex datasets and create meaningful visualizations using Power BI to aid decision-making for internal stakeholders.
Collaboration: Work closely with marketing, sales, IT, and executive teams to support commercial excellence through data-driven insights.
Performance Reviews: Assist in preparing monthly performance reviews for different countries by extracting and analyzing CRM and sales data.



Required Skills And Experience


5+ years of experience in data analysis, with a strong focus on Veeva CRM and Power BI.
Expertise in Veeva CRM, including experience with data integration and process optimization.
Proven ability to create insightful, actionable visualizations in Power BI.
Strong collaboration skills, with the ability to work across multiple departments (marketing, sales, IT, and executives).
Biotech, rare diseases, or product launch experience preferred.
Multilingual capabilities (German or French) are a plus but not required.
A go-getter attitude, with a passion for data and driving business results.

Title: Data Warehouse Analyst
Description:
Die Hays Schweiz AG sucht aktuell im Kanton Aargau einen Data Warehouse Analyst (m/w) f√ºr unseren Kunden, einen Kernkraftwerk. Hier sind weitere Informationen zur Stelle:




Ihre zuk√ºnftige Aufgaben als Data Warehouse Analyst:




Zusammenf√ºhren von strukturierten und unstrukturierten Datenbest√§nden unterschiedlicher Formate aus unterschiedlichen Datenquellen
Aufbereiten zusammengef√ºhrter Daten f√ºr ihre Auswertung in Analyse-Werkzeugen
Erkennen von relevanten Mustern und Analysieren von Zusammenh√§ngen in Daten
Erstellen von Reports zu Datenanalysen und Entwicklung von komplexen Algorithmen (z.B. Clustering, lineare Regression, neuronale Netze, Entscheidungsb√§ume) f√ºr das Ermitteln von Ursache-Wirkungs-Zusammenh√§ngen sowie f√ºr das Erstellen von quantitativen Prognosemodellen
Integrieren automatisierter Datenanalysen in ICT-Prozesse und Beraten bei der Durchf√ºhrung von Auswertungen sowie bei der Optimierung von Datenanalysen
Mitgestalten einer unternehmensweiten Datenarchitektur




Erforderliche Qualifikationen:




Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium in einem relevanten Bereich sowie berufliche Erfahrung
Kenntnisse √ºber Datenbankmanagementsysteme und Data-Warehousing Konzepte sowie die F√§higkeit, Gesch√§ftsanforderung in technische Spezifikationen zu √ºbersetzen
Vertrautheit mit Tools zur Datenvisualisierung (z.B. Power BI, Tableau, QlikView), mit der Prinzipen der Datenmodellierung, Data Integration und Data Governance sowie Kenntnisse √ºber bew√§hrte Verfahren der Datenvisualisierung und des Berichtswesens
Vertrautheit mit Back-End Technologien (z.B Java, Python, C#, C++)
Fliessende Deutschkenntnisse sowie gute Englischkenntnisse




Start: ab sofort nach Vereinbarung, Oktober gew√ºnscht

Dauer: 24 Monaten mit Option auf Verl√§ngerung (√úbernahme jederzeit m√∂glich)

Title: Data Analyst - Metals Sector
Description:
We are looking for an ambitious data analyst who is passionate about sustainability and data-driven business. In this role, you will work with ecoinvent users and data providers to enhance the metals sector of the ecoinvent database.







Responsibilities

Provide technical support for diverse projects aimed at improving and developing the core structure of the ecoinvent database and the expansion of its coverage, including.
Desk research tasks, deep dives into metal production processes, and providing analyses to the sector manager. Reviewing datasets for data provision projects.
Collaborate with external stakeholders, such as data providers, to guide them through the data preparation and submission process.
Support the communication efforts of ecoinvent, reinforcing support for users of the ecoinvent database.




Qualification

Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs Degree in Mining, Metallurgy, Materials Science and engineering or a related field a must.
Preferably a minimum of one year of industry experience in mining, metal processing, or a related field.
Experience in LCA, practical or theoretical, and the ecoinvent methodology and data is a plus.
Proficiency in English; any other language is an asset.
Proficiency in MS Office.
Basic programming skills in Python.
Basic modeling skill.
Self-motivated attitude, systematic thinking, and strong attention to detail.




The ideal candidate brings strong critical thinking skills and a problem-solving attitude. You are proactive, structured, and organized. You are enthusiastic about learning and pushing for innovation. You will work independently and alongside internal and external collaborators, so good interpersonal skills, effective communication skills, and a can-do attitude are essential. Managing multiple, diverse tasks simultaneously does not phase you. You enjoy working in a diverse and international team, have a curious mind, and grasp new concepts quickly.




Why ecoinvent?

As a fast-growing team based in Z√ºrich with over twenty nationalities, we embrace diversity and promote a collaborative and adventurous mindset. We are committed to building an inspiring work culture that nurtures creative thinking, transparency, and reliability.




Our benefits include flexible and hybrid work, employee professional growth plans, and our most vital asset: our community. We value transparency, flexibility, and a diverse working environment that encourages learning and continuous improvement. Collaboration is at the heart of what we do. Join us and make an impact.




Our Mission

ecoinvent is an internationally active, mission-driven organization devoted to supporting high-quality, science-based environmental assessments. Its activities include publishing and maintaining the ecoinvent database‚Äîa comprehensive life cycle inventory database that provides reliable and transparent information on the environmental impacts of various products and services. It is used by companies, researchers, and policymakers to analyze the environmental impacts of their operations and make informed decisions.




Interested in this unique opportunity?

Please submit your complete application through our LinkedIn posting, including your CV and possible start date




Please note that immigration sponsorship is not possible for this role.

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Profil du candidat


You are a young graduate and have demonstrated a first successful experience as a Data Engineer with a background in PySpark, AWS, DataOps, and/or DevOps.
You have strong programming skills in languages such as Python and SQL.
You have a previous experience with data modeling, ETL development, and data warehousing.
You show a strong interest for the commodities trading or energy sectors.
You are an excellent problem-solver and you pay attention to detail.
You have strong communication skills and the ability to work in a team environment.



Activit√©s

Are you a Data Engineer with a passion for innovation and problem-solving? We are looking for a talented individual with expertise in Databricks, AWS, DataOps and/or DevOps to join our team and help us harness the power of data.

Key Responsibilities:


Design and implement complex data solutions using Databricks and AWS.
Develop and maintain scalable and reliable data pipelines.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality data solutions.
Implement DataOps and DevOps best practices to improve the efficiency and quality of data delivery.
Monitor and optimize data systems to ensure optimal performance.



What We Offer:


A dynamic and challenging work environment with opportunities for growth and development.
A collaborative team that values innovation and creativity.
A commitment to diversity and inclusion in the workplace.



If you are a Data Engineer looking for an exciting new challenge and the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and take the next step in your career with us!

Contexte et environnement

Role Overview: As a Data Engineer, you will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining our data infrastructure. You will work closely with our team to design, build, and optimize data pipelines, ensuring the highest quality of data availability and accuracy.
Show more
HTML:
Profil du candidat

  • You are a young graduate and have demonstrated a first successful experience as a Data Engineer with a background in PySpark, AWS, DataOps, and/or DevOps.
  • You have strong programming skills in languages such as Python and SQL.
  • You have a previous experience with data modeling, ETL development, and data warehousing.
  • You show a strong interest for the commodities trading or energy sectors.
  • You are an excellent problem-solver and you pay attention to detail.
  • You have strong communication skills and the ability to work in a team environment.


Activit√©s

Are you a Data Engineer with a passion for innovation and problem-solving? We are looking for a talented individual with expertise in Databricks, AWS, DataOps and/or DevOps to join our team and help us harness the power of data.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement complex data solutions using Databricks and AWS.
  • Develop and maintain scalable and reliable data pipelines.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality data solutions.
  • Implement DataOps and DevOps best practices to improve the efficiency and quality of data delivery.
  • Monitor and optimize data systems to ensure optimal performance.


What We Offer:

  • A dynamic and challenging work environment with opportunities for growth and development.
  • A collaborative team that values innovation and creativity.
  • A commitment to diversity and inclusion in the workplace.


If you are a Data Engineer looking for an exciting new challenge and the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and take the next step in your career with us!

Contexte et environnement

Role Overview: As a Data Engineer, you will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining our data infrastructure. You will work closely with our team to design, build, and optimize data pipelines, ensuring the highest quality of data availability and accuracy.

Title: Exciting Part-Time Opportunity for Data Science Students! (40-80%)
Description:
MDPI Introduction

A pioneer in scholarly open-access publishing, MDPI has been supporting academic communities since 1996. Our mission is to foster open scientific exchange in all forms and across all disciplines. We operate more than 400 diverse, peer-reviewed, open-access journals, supported by over 35,500 academic editors. We serve scholars from around the world to ensure the latest research is openly and broadly available.

Team Introduction / Position

To strengthen our AI team and the Technology Innovation department, we are looking for a working student in Data Science. This is a part-time position based in our city center office in Basel, Switzerland.

As a Data Science Student, you will be responsible for assisting with the development, experimentation, and creation of machine learning, statistical, and advanced mathematical algorithms for various applications, focusing on NLP, Graph Machine Learning, or LLM models. You will also support the analytics team by analyzing data and developing business dashboards for management.

Tasks & Responsibilities

Support the AI team in developing applications in the areas of NLP, LLM, and Graph Machine Learning.
Develop, optimize, and evaluate new machine learning and statistical models.
Explore new approaches and algorithms to solve specific business problems.
Research and compare prototype solutions.

Requirements

Currently enrolled as a BSc or MSc student in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or Physics.
Theoretical and technical knowledge of machine learning and deep learning algorithms.
Proficiency in Python, including statistical and machine learning libraries (knowledge of other programming languages, such as R, is a plus).
Ability to create dashboards using Streamlit or Shiny is a plus.
Experience with deep learning development frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow) is beneficial.
Experience in applying and implementing NLP and/or Graph Machine Learning is advantageous.
Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to articulate, document, share, and present ideas and results to both technical and non-technical audiences (fluency in English is required).
A creative team player with a results-oriented mindset.
Strong analytical thinking skills.

If you are interested in this position, we look forward to receiving your complete application. Please submit your cover letter and CV. We are excited about the possibility of welcoming you to our Basel office.

Initiatives
At MDPI, we develop and maintain various platforms in order to better serve the scientific community. Please find here-below a list of our main platforms:
https://www.mdpi.com/
https://sciprofiles.com/
https://sciforum.net/
https://www.scilit.net/
https://www.preprints.org/
https://encyclopedia.pub/

Show more

Title: Python Engineer ‚Äì Data (Quant Finance)
Description:
Job Title: Python Engineer ‚Äì Data (Quant Finance)




Location: Zurich (Switzerland)




Overview:




One of Europe‚Äôs leading trading firms is looking to hire a strong Python Engineer with a Data Engineering/Data Science background to join a fast-growing Zurich office. The firm in question takes a scientific approach to the markets, placing a large emphasis on research and technology.




In this role, you will have the chance to brush shoulders with some of the best minds from both inside and outside of finance, with your work having a direct impact on trading. As a result of this impact, you will be compensated in line with leading firms in the quant finance space.




What you‚Äôll be doing:




You‚Äôll be working closely alongside trading desks to understand their data needs and create datasets accordingly.
You will leverage internal tools to assist trading desks in their use of data for building trading systems.
You will manage data-sourcing initiatives across the full data lifecycle.




About you:




You are an expert Python programmer ‚Äì C/C++ is a nice-to-have.
3+ years of experience working as a Data Engineer, Data Scientist or Data Analyst.
Knowledge of market data ecosystems, and an interest in financial markets, programming and data analysis.
You‚Äôll have a post-graduate degree in Computing, Data Science or another relevant STEM subject.
You will be a strong communicator, able to work across multiple trading desks at a fast pace.
Previous finance experience




If you are a data-focused Python Engineer based in Switzerland and interested in having a direct impact at one of Europe‚Äôs leading trading firms, please apply.

Title: Data Engineer (100% Remote - Switzerland)
Description:
About The Job

At Tether, we're committed to making advanced AI technologies more accessible. Thanks to its investment in AI infrastructure, starting from Northern Data, Tether is now in a prime position to tackle ambitious AI projects. Our goal is to build the next generation of AI models, leading innovation in AI, through an accessible, transparent and privacy preserving approach.The role involves building AI solutions across the spectrum from large-scale models designed for advanced applications to smaller, highly performant models tailored for efficiency on edge devices such as mobile phones and laptops.Our dynamic team operates entirely remotely, uniting talent from every corner of the globe. Our journey has been marked by rapid growth and efficient operations, firmly establishing us as pioneers within the industry. Join us in building AI models and solutions that not only compete with but exceed the capabilities of current leaders, driving both technological advancement and broad accessibility.

What You'll Do:


Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable Python code to construct data pipelines.
Work closely with data scientists and analysts to understand and fulfill their data requirements.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of data pipelines.
Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems.
Maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.
Develop and implement data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and data quality.
Collaborate with teams to integrate systems.
4+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role.
Strong programming skills in Python.
Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc.
Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases.
Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.
Strong project management and organizational skills.
Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.


Preferred Qualifications:


Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field.
Experience with machine learning algorithms and libraries.
Familiarity with data visualization tools.

Title: Senior Business Intelligence Consultant
Company: Berkeley Square - Talent Specialists in IT & Engineering
Description:
Job Title: Senior Business Intelligence Consultant

Location: Zurich/Remote




At Berkeley Square, we are dedicated to connecting top talent with leading organizations. As a recruitment agency, we specialize in identifying and placing exceptional candidates for a diverse range of roles.




About the Role: As a Business Intelligence Consultant, you will be instrumental in helping our client achieve their data-driven goals. You will collaborate closely with the client to understand their needs and deliver tailored BI solutions that drive strategic decision-making. This role requires a mix of technical expertise and business insight.




Responsibilities:

Collaborate with clients to gather and analyze business requirements.
Design and develop BI solutions, including reports, dashboards, and data visualizations.
Implement and configure BI tools and platforms such as Power BI, Tableau, or similar.
Develop and maintain ETL processes to integrate and transform data from various sources.
Perform data analysis to uncover trends, patterns, and insights that support business objectives.
Provide recommendations and best practices for data management and BI strategies.
Train and support clients in the use of BI tools and solutions.
Monitor and optimize BI performance to ensure efficiency and reliability.




Qualifications:

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Data Science, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in Business Intelligence, Data Analysis, or a similar role.
Proficiency with BI tools such as Power BI, Tableau, or QlikView.
Strong experience in SQL and data modeling.
Knowledge of ETL processes and data warehousing concepts.




Preferred Skills:

Experience with data science techniques and machine learning.
Familiarity with cloud-based BI platforms (e.g., Azure, AWS).
Relevant certifications in BI tools or data analysis.
Fluent in German and English.




Pay range and compensation package: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunities for professional growth and development. A supportive and collaborative work environment. Remote work option. Access to the latest BI tools and technologies.




If you are a skilled Business Intelligence Consultant interested in working with a forward-thinking company, we would love to hear from you.

Title: Online Data Analyst
Description:
We are hiring freelance German speaking Online Data Analysts for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography.




This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, e.g., verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task.




Requirements

Full Professional Proficiency in English & German
You must be living in Switzerland for the last 2 consecutive years
Ability to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website information
You must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in Switzerland
Being open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)
Applicants must be 18 years or over.




Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks.




Why Join the TELUS International AI Community?

Earn extra income
Access to our community wellbeing initiative
Remote work & Location Independence
Be your own boss
Flexible Hours to fit in with your lifestyle
Be a part of an online community




TELUS International AI-Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community. www.telusinternational.com







If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at sourcingteam63@telusinternational.ai

Title: Analista de Dados
HTML:
About The Company

Se para voc√™ a tecnologia existe para melhorar o caminho da vida, para o nosso time tamb√©m: Seu Caminho, Nossa Jornada.

Acreditamos nas pessoas que transformam seus caminhos atrav√©s da tecnologia. Tecnologia que conecta gente boa no que faz e que vive a diversidade para criar e compartilhar at√© os caminhos que a gente (ainda!) nem sabe quais s√£o. A nossa jornada est√° no sorriso de cada talento que entrega a revolu√ß√£o para o mundo a partir do Brasil - seja com transporte por aplicativo (99) ou pagamentos digitais (99Pay).

Para facilitar a vida de milh√µes de pessoas todos os dias, sentamos no banco da frente ao fazer parte da DiDi Chuxing, a maior plataforma de conveni√™ncia e transporte por aplicativo do mundo. E assim podemos dizer, com muito orgulho, que somos pioneiros na cria√ß√£o de solu√ß√µes que come√ßam no Brasil para ganhar escala e gerar impacto positivo em diversos pa√≠ses.

Seja para construir projetos do zero ou aprimorar continuamente nossas solu√ß√µes, gostamos de desafios que nos fazem sentir frio na barriga e √© por isso que trabalhamos com intensidade, num ritmo acelerado, com respeito, colabora√ß√£o e parceria. Nessa jornada, tamb√©m geramos aprendizado e nos fortalecemos na diversidade das pessoas como aspecto fundamental que nos diferencia e fortalece nosso crescimento dia ap√≥s dia.

About The Team/role

A fun√ß√£o de analista de opera√ß√µes √© uma oportunidade √∫nica de ter um impacto mensur√°vel na Mobilidade do Brasil por meio do crescimento e otimiza√ß√£o da estrat√©gia de opera√ß√£o das cidades na plataforma da 99. Esta √© uma fun√ß√£o cr√≠tica, pois voc√™ ser√° respons√°vel por melhorar continuamente nossa estrat√©gia de pre√ßos, considerando o equil√≠brio do mercado e a elasticidade da oferta e demanda.

In this role, you'll be...

  • Diagnosticando o desempenho do mercado para otimizar o plano de investimentos;
  • Desenvolvendo estrat√©gias de engajamento e campanhas para aumentar a frequ√™ncia/reten√ß√£o do usu√°rio na plataforma;
  • Utilizando dados para entender o comportamento do usu√°rio e √°reas de melhoria em nossos neg√≥cios, usando SQL e outras ferramentas para converter bancos de dados brutos em insights acion√°veis;
  • Fazendo recomenda√ß√µes e propor novas ferramentas de visualiza√ß√£o/pain√©is para melhorar o desempenho;
  • Colaborando com equipes multifuncionais para coletar e analisar dados, fornecendo insights para dar suporte √† tomada de decis√µes estrat√©gicas;
  • Tendo ideias gerais e dividi-las em etapas acion√°veis com cronogramas progressivos para conclus√£o;
  • Equilibrando a aten√ß√£o aos detalhes com a execu√ß√£o r√°pida - precisamos fazer as coisas rapidamente e precisamos faz√™-las bem. Equilibrar isso pode ser desafiador, mas esse deve ser nosso ponto forte.


We're eager to be in touch because you have...

  • Forma√ß√£o acad√™mica em ci√™ncias exatas, como engenharia, matem√°tica, estat√≠stica ou √°reas relacionadas;
  • Habilidades anal√≠ticas e capacidade de resolver problemas complexos de forma estruturada e eficaz;
  • Mentalidade pr√°tica, com capacidade de trabalhar de forma independente e como parte de uma equipe para atingir resultados;
  • Experi√™ncia em fun√ß√µes de opera√ß√µes, de prefer√™ncia em cen√°rios complexos e din√¢micos;
  • Habilidades de comunica√ß√£o e capacidade de influenciar e envolver as partes interessadas em todos os n√≠veis da organiza√ß√£o;
  • Comprometimento com a melhoria cont√≠nua e busca pela excel√™ncia operacional;
  • Habilidades avan√ßadas em Excel e PowerPoint s√£o essenciais;
  • Profici√™ncia em ingl√™s ser√° obrigat√≥rio;
  • Experi√™ncia com linguagens de programa√ß√£o como SQL, R, Python, etc. √© desej√°vel.


You'll love working at DiDi because...

We create user value

We strive to always create valuable experiences for our users in everything we do. Our focus is to always innovate new experiences that are safe, pleasant and efficient.

We are data-driven

We are strong believers in making informed decisions, that‚Äôs why we are data-driven. We can better navigate the business landscape strategically by analyzing valuable metrics.

Win-win Collaboration

Success is a team sport. When we work to help our partners and colleagues win, we win, too. While keeping everyone's best interest at heart, we communicate with candor and execute with excellence in all we do.

We believe in integrity

Integrity is at the very core of our business. We are people who always want to do the right thing. Our intentions are sincere, we speak our minds and listen to each other.

Growth

We always strive to do better. That means venturing beyond our comfort zones, learning from our mistakes, and helping each other grow.

Diversity and Inclusion

Diversity is one of our biggest strengths. Our differences are what make us distinct. We respect each other and believe in equal opportunities for all.

Diversity & Inclusion

Diversity is not a vision of the future or something we wish to have one day, it is a non-negotiable value of who we are.

We practice inclusion, plurality, and respect. And we count on the governance of the Diversity Committee, which works together with HR, leadership and identity groups - 99Adapta, 99Afro, 99Cores, 99Mulheres, and 99Mam√£es. This part of our journey has been written, there remains a long road before us.

We reinforce that this position is open to everyone, including pregnant people and people with disabilities (PwD).

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
About The Company

If you see technology as there to smooth your path in life, our team does too: Your Path, Our Journey.

We believe in people who transform their paths through technology. Technology connects people who are good at what they do and which practices diversity to create and share those paths that we (as yet!) do not even know about. Our journey is in the smile of every talented person who brings revolution to the world from Brazil - whether with in-app transportation (99) or digital payments (99Pay).

To make life easier for millions of people every day, we are in the driving seat as part of DiDi Global Inc., the world's leading mobility technology platform. And so, we can say, with great pride, that we are pioneers in creating solutions, starting in Brazil, that grow in scale and have positive impacts in a range of other countries.

Whether creating projects from scratch or continually improving our solutions, we like challenges that give us butterflies, and that's why we work with intensity, at a fast pace, with respect, collaboration, and partnership. On this journey, we also create learning and strengthen ourselves in diversity as a fundamental aspect that makes us stand out for our growth day after day.

About The Team/role

Become a strategic Business Partner in the creation of stakeholder value by leveraging data to deliver insightful, timely, and accurate information and recommendations that lead to customer-centric improvements in the operation of DiDi‚Äôs ridesharing business.

The successful candidate must be able to conduct broad and deep-dive analysis, gather and consolidate relevant data using various sources and data-manipulation tools, identify key insights and present findings to team and other stakeholders, demonstrating attention to detail, data-driven thinking, clear communication and strong business acumen.

In this role, you'll be...


Interacting with stakeholders to understand the business needs
Developing SQL codes to answer business questions
Giving support for different squads across the CX department
Creating automated solutions to integrate different data sources
Supporting our business partners with data perspective
Validating data and calculation methodologies between different area departments



We're eager to be in touch because you have...


At least one year of experience with technical skills such as SQL knowledge (Python is a plus)
Advanced/fluent English speaking
Statistical knowledge (R is a plus)
Ability to embrace change in a fast paced environment
Data visualization tools and storytelling skills
Clear communication and the ability to explain data insights to non-data personnel



You'll love working at DiDi because...

We create user value

We strive to always create valuable experiences for our users in everything we do. Our focus is to always innovate new experiences that are safe, pleasant and efficient.

We are data-driven

We are strong believers in making informed decisions, that‚Äôs why we are data-driven. We can better navigate the business landscape strategically by analyzing valuable metrics.

Win-win Collaboration

Success is a team sport. When we work to help our partners and colleagues win, we win, too. While keeping everyone's best interest at heart, we communicate with candor and execute with excellence in all we do.

We believe in integrity

Integrity is at the very core of our business. We are people who always want to do the right thing. Our intentions are sincere, we speak our minds and listen to each other.

Growth

We always strive to do better. That means venturing beyond our comfort zones, learning from our mistakes, and helping each other grow.

Diversity and Inclusion

Diversity is one of our biggest strengths. Our differences are what make us distinct. We respect each other and believe in equal opportunities for all.

Diversity & Inclusion

Diversity is not a vision of the future or something we wish to have one day, it is a non-negotiable value of who we are.

We practice inclusion, plurality, and respect. And we count on the governance of the Diversity Committee, which works together with HR, leadership and identity groups - 99Adapta, 99Afro, 99Cores, 99Mulheres, and 99Mam√£es. This part of our journey has been written, there remains a long road before us.

We reinforce that this position is open to everyone, including pregnant people and people with disabilities (PwD).

Title: Junior Software Developer
Description:
Cosa Ti Proponiamo

Stiamo cercando uno Junior Software Developer appassionato e competente, pronto a fare la differenza nel nostro team di Back-End nell'ambito Digital Experience. Il tuo obiettivo sar√† creare soluzioni innovative multicanale e cross-mercato, lavorando a stretto contatto con i nostri Solution Designer e specialisti UI/UX. Avrai la responsabilit√† di sviluppare componenti di Back-End che rispondano perfettamente alle necessit√† dei nostri clienti, seguendo le migliori pratiche del settore.

Entrerai a far parte di progetti dinamici che integrano le tecnologie pi√π avanzate e gli strumenti di programmazione all'avanguardia del Back End, con un focus particolare sull'uso del framework Springboot per lo sviluppo di microservizi implementando logiche di business complesse lato server ed esporle agli strati software di Front End attraverso API RESTful.

Se sei appassionato di sviluppo Back End e desideri mettere le tue competenze al servizio di progetti stimolanti, questa √® la tua occasione per brillare in un ambiente collaborativo e all'avanguardia. Quali saranno le tue attivit√† e responsabilit√†?


Partecipare attivamente a tutte le fasi del ciclo di vita delle web app, dalla concezione alla realizzazione, fino al rilascio e all'evoluzione continua, collaborando strettamente con il team per assicurare soluzioni di alta qualit√†.
Collaborare in autonomia e coordinarsi con il team leader e i colleghi.
Interfacciarsi con il team di progettazione di business per definire e implementare tutti i flussi applicativi che eccedano le aspettative dei clienti, rispettando i vincoli tecnici e funzionali dei progetti.
Condividere conoscenze ed apprendere dai colleghi, partecipando ad eventi formativi e sessioni di scouting, per contribuire alla crescita continua e allo sviluppo delle competenze all'interno del team.


Qualifiche e Competenze Richieste


Sei un Laureando o un Neolaureato in Informatica, Ingegneria Informatica o equivalente.
Conoscenza di Java Standard Edition, Java Enterprise Edition.
Conoscenza del protocollo di rete HTTP/s.
Conoscenza dei framework Spring e SpringBoot.
Conoscenza dei framework di mappatura SQL e O/R e della programmazione orientata agli oggetti.
Buone capacit√† interpersonali, un forte orientamento all‚Äôobiettivo e alla qualit√† del software prodotto.
Capacit√† di lavoro in team, autonomia sui task assegnati e predisposizione al team building.
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese.


Cosa cerchiamo nelle nostre persone?


Ambizione,‚ÄØnel perseguire grandi obiettivi e nell'investire sul miglioramento continuo;
Proattivit√†,‚ÄØnell‚Äôanticipare e affrontare le sfide con iniziativa;
Trasparenza,‚ÄØnel comunicare apertamente e fornire feedback costruttivi;
Motivazione‚ÄØa migliorare e a crescere insieme agli altri, manifestando apertura al confronto per favorire la crescita collettiva e il raggiungimento degli obiettivi comuni.


Invia la tua candidatura e raccontaci come puoi fare la differenza.‚ÄØ

Title: Kubernetes Specialist
HTML:
IET √® un‚Äôazienda in forte crescita. Il nostro obbiettivo √® quello di sviluppare soluzioni tech to the point per clienti leader di mercato che ci commissionano software altamente innovativi e platform-oriented. Il nostro √® un ambiente in cui la tua figura avr√† un impatto tangibile, dove acquisirai know-how a 360 gradi.


Siamo alla ricerca di un Kubernetes Specialist che abbia maturato un‚Äôesperienza di almeno 2 anni nell‚Äôambito.


Requisiti richiesti:

  • Conoscenza base di Kubernetes, inclusi i suoi componenti principali (API Server, etcd, Controller Manager, Scheduler, Kubelet e Kube-Proxy);
  • Minima esperienza con la gestione di cluster Kubernetes, inclusa la creazione, il ridimensionamento e l'aggiornamento di essi;
  • Esperienza nell‚Äôutilizzo di Docker;
  • Conoscenza dei principi e delle pratiche DevOps;
  • Esperienza in linguaggi di scripting come Bash, Python;
  • Conoscenza base con strumenti di automazione come Ansible o Terraform per la gestione delle configurazioni e delle applicazioni in Kubernetes;
  • Capacit√† di integrare Kubernetes con i servizi cloud specifici del provider;
  • Abilit√† nella diagnosi e risoluzione dei problemi comuni nei cluster Kubernetes.


Requisiti nice to have:

  • Laurea in Informatica o in materie STEM;
  • Conoscenza della rete di Kubernetes, inclusi CNI (Container Network Interface) plugin come Calico, Flannel o Weave;
  • Capacit√† di configurare servizi di rete come Ingress Controller e Load Balancer;
  • Esperienza nella risoluzione dei problemi di rete all'interno di un cluster Kubernetes;
  • Comprensione delle opzioni di storage in Kubernetes, come Persistent Volumes (PV) e Persistent Volume Claims (PVC);
  • Conoscenza delle pratiche di sicurezza in Kubernetes, inclusi RBAC (Role-Based Access Control), autenticazione e autorizzazione;
  • Capacit√† di implementare e configurare soluzioni di monitoraggio come Prometheus, Grafana e altri strumenti di osservabilit√†;


Soft skills: 

  • Propensione al lavoro in team;
  • Ottime capacit√† organizzative;
  • Trovarsi a proprio agio con l'apprendimento di nuove tecnologie; 
  • Leadership;
  • Ottime skills comunicative e di problem solving;

Title: Enterprise Architect
Description:
Il Gruppo BCC Iccrea √® il maggiore gruppo bancario cooperativo, l‚Äôunico gruppo bancario nazionale a capitale interamente italiano e il quarto gruppo bancario in Italia per attivi. Oggi il Gruppo √® costituito da 117 Banche di Credito Cooperativo, presenti in oltre 1.700 comuni italiani con quasi 2.500 sportelli, e da altre societ√† bancarie, finanziarie e strumentali controllate da BCC Banca Iccrea. BCC Sistemi Informatici √® il polo informatico del Gruppo Bancario Cooperativo Iccrea che fornisce alle BCC prodotti e servizi focalizzati sui bisogni tecnologici e informatici del cliente, con l‚Äôobiettivo di rappresentare il punto di riferimento per le esigenze dell‚Äôintero Sistema del Credito Cooperativo. BCC Sistemi Informatici √® il polo informatico del Gruppo Bancario Cooperativo Iccrea che fornisce alle BCC prodotti e servizi focalizzati sui bisogni tecnologici e informatici del cliente, con l‚Äôobiettivo di rappresentare il punto di riferimento per le esigenze dell‚Äôintero Sistema del Credito Cooperativo.

L‚ÄôUnit√† Organizzativa Ict Strategy & Architecture definisce gli standard architetturali delle infrastrutture IT, middleware e applicative, in linea con la strategia ICT e architetturale, delle politiche e delle linee guida definite dalla Capogruppo e con gli obiettivi di sicurezza informatica definiti e applicabili a tutte le societ√† del Gruppo. In tale ambito provvede a: supportare l‚ÄôArea CIO di Capogruppo e la Direzione della Societ√† nella definizione della strategia ICT; indirizzare la progettazione delle infrastrutture e delle applicazioni, di concerto con le unit√† organizzative della Societ√† in linea con la strategia ICT definita; supportare le linee operative nella capacit√† di assorbire nuovi modelli di business innovativi abilitati dalle nuove tecnologie digitali. In tale UO ricerchiamo una risorsa per ricoprire il ruolo di Enterprise Architect, cui affidare la progettazione delle architetture applicative e infrastrutturali, in ottica ‚ÄúSecurity by Design‚Äù, contribuendo alla definizione della Blue Print architetturale, in linea con la strategia ICT del Gruppo BCC Iccrea.

Principali attivit√†:

definire e mantenere la Blue Print architetturale, in linea con la strategia ICT, le esigenze di innovazione e la strategia di sourcing identificata per l‚Äôevoluzione verso il Cloud dell‚Äôintero Gruppo;
definire e mantenere le linee guida, gli standard e i framework architetturali per la progettazione ‚ÄúSecurity by Design‚Äù delle infrastrutture, delle applicazioni, dei servizi Cloud e del modello di integrazione complessivo;
contribuire alla definizione di linee guida connesse al ciclo di vita del software e alla determinazione delle regole di ingegneria del software a supporto dell‚Äôevoluzione del framework di sviluppo del sistema informativo;
progettare le architetture applicative e infrastrutturali seguendo le linee guida di progettazione e di sicurezza secondo le normative interne ed i principali benchmark di mercato.




Si richiede:

Laurea Specialistica di area Ingegneristica/ Informatica o Matematica/Fisica

Esperienza nella definizione di Blue Print architetturale, di linee guida, di standard e framework architetturali per la progettazione ‚ÄúSecurity by Design‚Äù delle infrastrutture, delle applicazioni, dei servizi Cloud e del modello di integrazione complessivo;

Esperienza nella definizione di linee guida connesse al ciclo di vita del software, alla stesura di processi in tale ambito e alla determinazione delle regole di ingegneria del software a supporto dell‚Äôevoluzione del framework di sviluppo del sistema informativo;

Esperienza nella progettazione di architetture software e infrastrutturali per l'implementazione di progetti IT complessi in ambiti bancari e non bancari.

Esperienza di modellazione delle architetture con strumenti di EA.

Esperienza nello scouting di mercato e nella software selection per la individuazione di soluzioni di mercato per coprire richieste delle UO di business.

Sar√† considerata preferenziale un‚Äôesperienza pregressa di almeno 5 anni in ambito ICT in istituti bancari.




Conoscenza dei principali framework architetturali (TOGAF), dei modelli e metodologie di sviluppo software, dei principali modelli di deployement infrastrutturale, degli strumenti di progettazione architetturale.

Esperienza nella progettazione, dalla raccolta requisiti al disegno soluzione, e rappresentazione di architetture IT complesse basate su ambienti tradizionali, on premise e cloud in contesti applicativi eterogenei.

Conoscenza generale delle principali tecnologie di mercato e delle loro caratteristiche.

Competenze sull‚Äôintegrazione applicativa ed API management.

Conoscenza delle principali piattaforme cloud e delle architetture basate su hybrid-cloud e multi-cloud.

Competenze base sulla metodologia DevOps, DevSecOps e delle principali soluzioni applicative a supporto dei relativi processi.

Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese.

Conoscenza di Office e degli strumenti di progettazione.

Ti ricordiamo che, ai sensi dell‚Äôart. 111-bis del Codice Privacy, non √® necessaria l‚Äôautorizzazione al trattamento dei dati personali presenti nel tuo cv.

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006 ed √® aperta a candidature di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, et√†, etnia e credo religioso. Il Gruppo BCC Iccrea riconosce che l'attenzione delle diversit√†, l‚Äôinclusione e la tutela dell‚Äôequilibrio fra vita privata e vita professionale siano principi fondamentali di creazione di valore per il Gruppo stesso.

NTT DATA, Trusted Global Innovator, √® tra i principali player a livello mondiale in ambito IT services. Con pi√π di 151.000 professionisti in oltre 50 Paesi in tutto il mondo, siamo protagonisti e acceleratori della trasformazione digitale offrendo ai nostri clienti soluzioni tecnologiche e innovative progettate su misura. Abbiamo creato spazi di lavoro che favoriscono il senso di comunit√† e lo scambio costruttivo di esperienze.

Guardiamo al nostro domani con la stessa passione di ieri e abbiamo bisogno anche del tuo talento!

Responsibilities

Nell‚Äôambito del potenziamento della struttura di Application Services, NTT DATA √® alla ricerca di Business Analyst con una comprovata esperienza nel settore assicurativo maturata lavorando su progetti collegati alla suite PassInsurance.

Required Skills

  • Curiosit√† e passione per la tecnologia e l'innovazione; desiderio di tenersi costantemente aggiornato sull'evoluzione e sull'applicabilit√† delle nuove tecnologie.


Completano Il Profilo

  • Disponibilit√† a lavorare in progetti in contesto internazionale e a trasferte in Italia e all‚Äôestero;
  • Laurea STEM o in Economia o esperienza lavorativa equivalente;
  • Eventuali certificazioni in ambito PassInsurance o in ambiti attinenti all‚Äôoggetto di questo annuncio;

Description:
Leonardo √® un gruppo industriale internazionale, tra le principali realt√† mondiali nell‚ÄôAerospazio, Difesa e Sicurezza che realizza capacit√† tecnologiche multidominio in ambito Elicotteri, Velivoli, Aerostrutture, Elettronica, Cyber Security e Spazio. Esperienza nell‚Äôambito di sistemi Lidar spaziali costituir√† titolo preferenziale:

Capacit√† di sviluppare modelli digitali per verifica requisiti di sistema e/o sottosistema (Model Based System Engineering) applicabile ad apparati laser.
Esperienza in attivit√† di modellizzazione matematica di sistemi laser in fibra e a stato solido, CW e impulsati.

Capacit√† di utilizzo della seguente strumentazione: Oscilloscopio, Radiometri laser, Spettrometri, Fotodiodi, laser beam profiler.
Esperienza nell'utilizzo di laser impulsati ad alta energia o CW di elevata potenza ottica (Classe 4)

HTML:
Descrizione lavoro: Your Role

In Capgemini Engineering, leader mondiale nei servizi di ingegneria, uniamo un team globale di ingegneri, scienziati e architetti per aiutare le aziende pi√π innovative del mondo a liberare il loro potenziale. Dai veicoli autonomi ai robot salvavita, i nostri esperti in tecnologia digitale e software pensano fuori dagli schemi offrendo servizi unici di R&D e ingegneria in tutti i settori.

Unisciti a noi per una carriera piena di opportunit√†, dove puoi fare la differenza e dove nessun giorno √® uguale all'altro.

Come Big Data Engineer presso Capgemini Engineering sarai coinvolto in progetti afferenti al settore Industriale delle Telecomunicazioni e lavorerai nell'ambito della nostra Practice Digital Engineering.

In questo ruolo ti occuperai delle seguenti attivit√†:

  • Sviluppo di soluzioni resilienti, performanti, scalabili e cloud ready, design, sviluppo, validazione delle implementazioni e il supporto al rilascio in esercizio, analisi preliminare (impact analysis), analisi e stime di fattibilit√†, progettazione, eventuale prototipazione, produzione di specifiche e documentazione tecnica di progetto, sviluppo, unit/system test, delivery del software, supporto agli integration test, analisi e sviluppi di performance tuning (su applicazioni, basi dati, middleware e/o soluzioni di integrazione) manutenzione del codice, gestione anomalie e reportistica.L‚Äôambiente di lavoro preferenziale, sar√† la toolchain di DevOps e il software sar√† depositato nel repository Git della toolchain.
  • Parteciperai ad un refactoring e replatforming di un ecosistema di applicativi (datalake) per il superamento di obsolescenze tecnologiche, miglioramento della scalabilit√† e della sicurezza, rimozione del lock-in verso terze parti e vincoli infrastrutturali. Obiettivi del refactor saranno inoltre una maggiore manutenibilit√† e continuit√† operativa, la possibilit√† di evolvere il Business ad essa collegata e in ottica Business Continuity, la resilienza e la gestione del disaster recovery intrinseca nelle soluzioni cloud native basate su GCP.
Your Profile
  • Aver maturato almeno 3 anni di esperienza nel ruolo;
  • Esperienza nell'acquisizione e processamento di big data, data analysis, data mining e data modeling;
  • Competenze in ottimizzazione delle prestazioni e statistica;
  • Padronanza dei tool di visualizzazione dati, con focus su rappresentazioni geospaziali;
  • Esperienza con Google Cloud Platform (GCP), in particolare GKE, BigQuery, Cloud Storage e Cloud SQL;
  • Buone capacit√† di programmazione in Java e Scala;
  • Esperienza con RDBMS e database NoSQL, con particolare enfasi su BigQuery;
  • Conoscenza degli algoritmi e modelli fondamentali di Machine Learning e relativi framework;
  • Familiarit√† con la toolchain DevOps di Atlassian (Bitbucket, Bamboo, Jira) e tecnologie di containerizzazione (Docker, Kubernetes);
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese, scritta e parlata, e della lingua italiana;
  • Esperienza di lavoro nella metodologia Agile Scrum;
  • Capacit√† di interagire efficacemente con clienti e fornitori;
  • Incarnare i valori di Capgemini di Audacia, Fiducia e Spirito di Squadra, promuovendo la collaborazione e la risoluzione proattiva dei problemi.

Note: Laurea Magistrale in discipline Ingegneristiche o STEM. Sar√† considerato un plus il possesso di certificazioni in ambito Data Engineering e DevOps.

Location: ROMA, modalit√† di lavoro ibrida (2gg/settimana in sede ‚Äì zona nord est)Tipologia contrattuale: Contratto a tempo indeterminato. La retribuzione sar√† commisurata in base all‚Äôesperienza e allo skillset

Company Profile

WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL LOVE ABOUT WORKING HERE

  • Riconosciamo l'importanza della modalit√† di lavoro flessibile per fornire un supporto concreto ai nostri dipendenti: che si tratti di lavoro da remoto o di orari di lavoro flessibili, avrai un ambiente per mantenere un sano equilibrio tra vita lavorativa e vita privata; 
  • Al centro della nostra missione c'√® la crescita della tua carriera. I nostri programmi di crescita professionale sono pensati per supportarti nell'esplorare un mondo di opportunit√†;
  • Ci impegniamo a favorire lo sviluppo del potenziale dei nostri professionisti, coinvolgendoli in prima persona nella vita aziendale per motivarli a migliorare le loro performance, grazie anche alla possibilit√† di seguire percorsi formativi ad hoc e ottenere certificazioni sulle ultime tecnologie;
  • Siamo impegnati a migliorare le nostre prestazioni collettive grazie al nostro ambiente di lavoro inclusivo in cui talenti diversi trovano adeguata valorizzazione. La diversity costituisce un aspetto essenziale della nostra cultura aziendale, espandendo i nostri orizzonti attraverso le dinamiche legate ad esperienza, cultura, etnia, regole di comportamento aziendali, personalit√† e comunicazione.

ABOUT CAPGEMINI GROUPLeader mondiale nei servizi di Engineering e R&D, Capgemini Engineering combina la sua profonda conoscenza dei settori industriali e le tecnologie all‚Äôavanguardia in ambito digital e software a supporto della convergenza tra mondo fisico e digitale. Beneficiando anche delle competenze del resto del Gruppo, aiuta i clienti ad accelerare il loro percorso verso l‚ÄôIntelligent Industry.  Capgemini Engineering pu√≤ contare su pi√π di 55.000 membri di un team di ingegneri e scienziati in oltre 30 paesi nel mondo, con competenze in diversi settori che includono Aeronautics, Space, Defense, Naval, Automotive, Rail, Infrastructure & Transportation, Energy, Utilities & Chemicals, Life Sciences, Communications, Semiconductor & Electronics, Industrial & Consumer, Software & Internet.Capgemini Engineering √® parte integrante del Gruppo Capgemini, partner globale per la trasformazione tecnologica e di business delle aziende, supporta i suoi clienti nella loro transizione verso un mondo pi√π digitale e sostenibile, creando impatto positivo per le imprese e la societ√†. Capgemini √® un gruppo responsabile e diversificato di 340.000 persone presente in pi√π di 50 paesi nel mondo. Oltre 55 anni di esperienza rendono Capgemini un partner affidabile per i suoi clienti, in grado di fornire soluzioni innovative per le loro esigenze di business. Capgemini offre servizi e soluzioni end-to-end, dalla strategia e progettazione all'ingegneria, grazie alle sue competenze all'avanguardia in ambito AI, cloud e dati, alla sua esperienza settoriale e al suo ecosistema di partner. Nel 2023 il Gruppo ha registrato ricavi complessivi pari a 22,5 miliardi di euro.Get the Future You Want | www.capgemini.comApply now!

L'offerta di lavoro si intende rivolta all'uno e all'altro sesso in ottemperanza al D.Lgs. 198/2006. Inoltre, prestiamo attenzione e sensibilit√† alle future risorse appartenenti alle categorie protette, ai sensi degli articoli 1 e 18 della legge 68 del ‚Äò99. I dati personali saranno trattati in conformit√† alle disposizioni contenute nel regolamento UE 2016/679.

Title: Payload Data Processing Engineer
HTML:
We are looking for a Payload Data Processing Engineer on behalf of the European Space Agency (ESA) for their location in Frascati, Italy, to join their IRIDE Project. The selected candidate should show integrity and professionalism.

A diverse range of support tasks is required to be carried out, encompassing algorithmic evaluation, development and validation and involving software, hardware and system constraints. These tasks are expected to address processing functions focusing on payload performance (image quality), data compression/reduction and data analysis

Please note, the successful candidate will be employed by ATG Europe (or one of its subsidiaries). Furthermore, upon selection, they will be subject to a general security screening performed by an external provider (further information will be provided at interview stage).

The successful candidate will be tasked with, but not limited to:

  • Analysis of system-level needs and definition of system and subsystem requirements‚Äô specifications for optical payload processing functions;
  • Definition, design, development, performance evaluation and verification of image processing functions and algorithms via simulation techniques;
  • Design, verification and validation of payload image processing chains
  • Support to HW/SW optimization and implementation of payload data processing functions on processors.

We encourage persons falling under categorie protette L.68/99 to apply. We do not discriminate based on disability.

  • Master‚Äôs degree in geoinformation , electronics, telecommunications or a related field;
  • At least 10 years of relevant experience;
  • Knowledge in image processing, compression and computer vision techniques;
  • Knowledge in optical imaging payloads, signal/image quality and on-board payload data processing functions;
  • Knowledge in SAR imaging payload data processing could be beneficial
  • Knowledge in simulation of image processing functions (Matlab, Python, ENVI/IDL, C, etc);
  • Knowledge in the design, training and validation of machine learning techniques (not limited to deep learning) for tasks such as prediction, classification, semantic segmentation, object detection, etc;
  • Familiarity with computational imaging techniques (image stabilization, super-resolution, active optics, etc);
  • Familiarity with payload data processing on-board systems architectures;
  • Familiarity with processing devices and on-board electronics design related to data acquisition and processing functions;
  • Familiarity with procurement of demonstrator units, sub-system integration and testing;
  • Ability to work in an autonomous manner, in particular when providing support to projects with high time allocations and this in coordination with the line manager;
  • Candidates must be eligible to live and work in the EU;
  • Fluency in English, both written and spoken.

Please submit your application in English via the apply button below. Applications submitted in other languages will not be considered.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Data Analyst

Ti piacerebbe far parte della multinazionale di sicurezza numero 1 in Europa?
Siamo alla ricerca di un/una Data Analyst da inserire nella nostra sede di Roma.

Entrare in Verisure significa avere la possibilit√† di lavorare in una realt√† internazionale in continua crescita, attualmente formata da oltre 26.000 mila persone in 17 Paesi nel mondo, che ha come missione la protezione delle famiglie, delle loro case e delle attivit√† commerciali. La passione per quello che facciamo e lo spirito innovativo sono parte del nostro DNA, che ci guida ogni giorno nel fare la differenza per le nostre persone, i nostri clienti e i nostri partner. Avrai infine la possibilit√† di unirti ad un team in cui ciascuno pu√≤ esprimere le proprie potenzialit√† all‚Äôinterno di un ambiente inclusivo, che mette al centro le persone.

In qualit√† di Data Analyst sarai inserito/a nel team Maintenance dell'area Operations.

Cosa farai:


Raccolta, organizzazione e strutturazione dati
Lettura dei dati attraverso metodi statistici al fine di individuarne correlazioni e pattern interpretativi, particolari trend o modelli ricorrenti dai quali si possano ricavare informazioni utili a supporto della pianificazione operativa
Aggiornamento e valutazione qualitativa della reportistica giornaliera, settimanale e mensile (es: produttivit√†, time to schedule, SLA‚Ä¶)
Progettazione ed elaborazione di nuovi Dashboard utili alla comprensione e condivisione dei dati con la struttura tramite l‚Äôutilizzo di Power BI


Quali conoscenze ed esperienze cerchiamo:


Laurea in economia, ingegneria gestionale, statistica, informatica
Esperienza di almeno 2 anni in un ruolo analogo,
Conoscenza avanzata di MS Office in particolare Power BI, Microsoft Excel, Power Point
Competenze su analisi dei dati, reporting e visualizzazione dati elaborati
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese


Di cosa avrai bisogno:


Capacit√† organizzativa ed autonomia
Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative
Inclinazione all‚Äôinnovazione e alla proattivit√†
Forti capacit√† di problem solving
Orientamento al continuo miglioramento delle procedure e degli strumenti utilizzati


All‚Äôinizio del tuo percorso in Verisure Italia sarai incluso/a in un processo di onboarding per supportarti nel tuo inserimento in azienda ed accederai a percorsi formativi ad hoc per accrescere le tue competenze.

Orario di lavoro: full-time 40 ore settimanali Luned√¨ - Venerd√¨

Sede di lavoro: Roma (zona Eur)

Qualcosa che forse non sai di noi:

Da pi√π di 35 anni, ‚ÄúSiamo persone che proteggono persone‚Äù.
Verisure √® l'Allarme Casa numero 1 in Italia e in Europa, scelto da¬†oltre 5 milioni di clienti nel mondo, che si sono affidati al nostro sistema ad Alta Sicurezza, tra i pi√π avanzati a livello globale, per proteggere ci√≤ che conta di pi√π per loro.

Cosa aspetti? Inviaci la tua candidatura per costruire insieme il tuo futuro professionale in Verisure Italia!

Verisure sostiene una politica a favore della diversit√† e dell‚Äôinclusione. Ci impegniamo a creare e promuovere un ambiente incentrato sull'uguaglianza e il rispetto. Nessuna forma di discriminazione sar√† attuata nella scelta dei candidati (L.903/77 e L.125/91).

Title: SAS CONSULTANT/SENIOR CONSULTANT
Description:
JAKALA Civitas offre servizi MarTech alla Pubblica Amministrazione Centrale & Locale, alle aziende municipalizzate, alle aziende di servizi in ambito Transportation e Sanit√†.

Jakala Civitas √® focalizzata su un vasto portfolio di servizi e soluzioni verso il cittadino ed il paziente con l‚Äôapproccio MarTech di JAKALA, per applicare i principi della Customer Experience a un‚Äôinedita Citizen & Patient Experience: consumatori, cittadini e pazienti sono lo stesso soggetto, con medesime necessit√†, caratteristiche e comportamenti.

Analisi dei dati, Machine Learning e AI, Geo Intelligence, sviluppo di infrastrutture tecnologiche, ottimizzazione di campagne di prevenzione e di comunicazione, e digitalizzazione dei servizi verso il cittadino ed il paziente sono i pilastri dell‚Äôofferta di JAKALA Civitas.




Posizione

Hai l‚Äôopportunit√† di scrivere una delle prime pagine di JAKALA CIVITAS: per il potenziamento della nostra practice Business Intelligence & Analytics siamo alla ricerca di un SAS Consultant/Senior Consultant che abbia dai 3 ai 5 anni di esperienza e che voglia unirsi alla nostra squadra per contribuire in maniera concreta allo sviluppo, alla gestione e alla realizzazione di progetti innovativi per il settore della Pubblica Amministrazione, in particolare nell‚Äôambito Digital Health, per il potenziamento e coordinamento di un importante stream progettuale e la gestione di un team di lavoro.

Il candidato ideale ha esperienza nella gestione di un team e ha una buona conoscenza di tecnologie quali SAS BASE, SAS MACRO, SAS DATA INTEGRATION, oltre che una buona padronanza del linguaggio SQL e PL/SQL.







Requisiti




Il candidato ideale possiede:

Laurea magistrale preferibilmente in Ingegneria Gestionale, Ingegneria Informatica, Matematica, Statistica oppure Economia Aziendale o Economia ma con un curriculum affine alle tematiche Tecnologiche
Esperienza da 3 a 5 anni da SAS CONSULTANT
Forte passione per il mondo del Technology Consulting ed esperienza in progetti Data Driven. Verr√† considerato un plus aver partecipato a progetti in ambito Digital Health
Conoscenza di SAS BASE, SAS MACRO, SAS DATA INTEGRATION, oltre che una buona padronanza del linguaggio SQL e PL/SQL.




Completano il profilo:

Spiccate capacit√† analitiche
Certificazioni su piattaforma SAS
Conoscenza dei tool Microsoft di Business Intelligence
Forte orientamento al risultato
Problem solving e capacit√† di lavorare per obiettivi
Attitudine al project management
Team working
Spiccate capacit√† relazionali
Precisione e cura del dettaglio

Cosa offriamo:

Ambiente di lavoro stimolante che favorisce la crescita professionale e i percorsi di carriera
Elevata autonomia e responsabilit√†
Rapporto diretto con il management aziendale e con i clienti
Coinvolgimento su progetti per clienti del settore della Pubblica Amministrazione
Continua attivit√† di Ricerca e Sviluppo

Sede di lavoro: Milano, Roma, Bari, Rende. Hybrid Working.







Cosa aspetti?

Diventa anche tu un JAKALER!

#JWANNABE
