Title: Responsible AI - Engineer Specialist
Description:
We are:

Accenture‚Äôs Global Responsible AI team within the Global Data & AI Practice. AI is becoming more pervasive, more powerful, and more accessible. With these new opportunities come increased risks. We work with leading organizations to ensure AI is designed, built, and deployed in a manner that engenders trust and adheres to laws, regulations and ethical norms. Our Responsible AI strategy will enable us to embed responsibility into all of Accenture‚Äôs data and AI activities. We‚Äôre developing and deploying differentiated IP and Responsible AI solutions with our ecosystem partners. We‚Äôll be engaging regulators to help shape the policy agenda, conducting pioneering research with academia and offer training and resources to our clients through the Responsible AI Academy. The risks of AI are real and well- known. Let‚Äôs help our clients turn those risks into opportunities.

You are:

We‚Äôre looking to grow our Responsible AI team and if you‚Äôre an experienced RAI Engineer with a Responsible AI background, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.

As a Responsible AI Engineer, you‚Äôll be experienced in building state of the art models to solve difficult business challenges. But you‚Äôll also have at least a year‚Äôs experience looking at responsible aspects such as AI model Fairness, Transparency, Explainability, Robustness, Soundness and Privacy ‚Äì preferably gained in a client-facing environment.

You‚Äôll be a problem solver who is passionate about all things data. You‚Äôll be excited by difficult modelling challenges, and you‚Äôll enjoy working with like-minded people who thrive on pushing the boundaries of the possible. You‚Äôll be an outstanding technical specialist with the strong communication skills needed to liaise with your clients and your colleagues.

At the forefront of the industry, you‚Äôll help make our Responsible AI vision a reality for clients looking to better serve their customers and operate always-on enterprises. We‚Äôre not just focused on increasing revenues ‚Äì our technologies and innovations are making millions of lives easier and more comfortable. But above all, we‚Äôre doing this responsibly and inclusively ‚Äì to make sure AI technology is used equitably and in a way that is both ethically and technically sound.

The work:

You‚Äôll be a key player helping to deliver outstanding work for our Responsible AI clients. Some of the areas you‚Äôll be working in include:



Developing and implementing AI models and solutions, focusing on ethical and responsible practices.


Detecting, evaluating, and applying relevant RAI dimensions (bias, fairness, robustness explainability etc.) in AI systems; work on mitigating the identified risks. Supporting client sales conversations and proposal preparation


Optimizing and maintaining existing AI systems for enhanced performance and adherence to ethical standards.


Participating in the full AI development lifecycle, including data preparation, design, coding, testing, deployment, and support.


Contributing to the development of internal guidelines, best practices for responsible AI development and technical training.


Staying updated with current AI trends, ethical considerations, and technological advancements.


Assisting in the identification and correction of biases in datasets and AI models.


Documenting AI development processes and maintain a transparent record of decisions and methodologies used.



Travel may be required for this role. The amount of travel will vary from 0 to 100% depending on business need and client requirements.

Here‚Äôs What You Need:



Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or related technical fields.


Experience in developing and deploying machine learning models and AI solutions. At least 2 from the following: Statistics and Probability Theory, Regression Modelling, Clustering Methods, Deep Learning, Neural Networks, Natural Language Processing, Text Mining, Computer Vision, Image Recognition, Time Series Forecasting, Machine Learning Visualization Tools, Tree Ensembles


Proficiency in programming languages like Python, R, or Java. Familiarity with AI and machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch). Experience on big data technologies and tools (e.g., Hadoop, Spark).


Experience with database management and data processing.


Understanding and working knowledge of cloud services and platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) related to AI.


Demonstrated ability to work with complex datasets and perform data preprocessing and analysis.


Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.


Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and communicate effectively with team members.


Commitment to ethical AI development and continuous learning in the field.


Ability to manage multiple projects and priorities in a fast-paced environment.


Excellent documentation and presentation skills for technical and non-technical audiences.



Bonus Points If You Have:



Additional courses or training in areas related to responsible AI, ethics in technology, or similar fields are beneficial.


Certifications in AI, machine learning, or data science.


Prior experience in projects focused on ethical AI or AI for social good.


Knowledge of AI ethics, data privacy, and regulatory frameworks.


Experience with AI model interpretability and explainability tools. Specialized visualization techniques (D3.js, ggplot etc.)


Project Management Experience


Linguistic proficiency (to a reasonable business level) in a language other than English

Show more
HTML:
We are:

Accenture‚Äôs Global Responsible AI team within the Global Data & AI Practice. AI is becoming more pervasive, more powerful, and more accessible. With these new opportunities come increased risks. We work with leading organizations to ensure AI is designed, built, and deployed in a manner that engenders trust and adheres to laws, regulations and ethical norms. Our Responsible AI strategy will enable us to embed responsibility into all of Accenture‚Äôs data and AI activities. We‚Äôre developing and deploying differentiated IP and Responsible AI solutions with our ecosystem partners. We‚Äôll be engaging regulators to help shape the policy agenda, conducting pioneering research with academia and offer training and resources to our clients through the Responsible AI Academy. The risks of AI are real and well- known. Let‚Äôs help our clients turn those risks into opportunities.

You are:

We‚Äôre looking to grow our Responsible AI team and if you‚Äôre an experienced RAI Engineer with a Responsible AI background, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.

As a Responsible AI Engineer, you‚Äôll be experienced in building state of the art models to solve difficult business challenges. But you‚Äôll also have at least a year‚Äôs experience looking at responsible aspects such as AI model Fairness, Transparency, Explainability, Robustness, Soundness and Privacy ‚Äì preferably gained in a client-facing environment.

You‚Äôll be a problem solver who is passionate about all things data. You‚Äôll be excited by difficult modelling challenges, and you‚Äôll enjoy working with like-minded people who thrive on pushing the boundaries of the possible. You‚Äôll be an outstanding technical specialist with the strong communication skills needed to liaise with your clients and your colleagues.

At the forefront of the industry, you‚Äôll help make our Responsible AI vision a reality for clients looking to better serve their customers and operate always-on enterprises. We‚Äôre not just focused on increasing revenues ‚Äì our technologies and innovations are making millions of lives easier and more comfortable. But above all, we‚Äôre doing this responsibly and inclusively ‚Äì to make sure AI technology is used equitably and in a way that is both ethically and technically sound.

The work:

You‚Äôll be a key player helping to deliver outstanding work for our Responsible AI clients. Some of the areas you‚Äôll be working in include:


  • Developing and implementing AI models and solutions, focusing on ethical and responsible practices.

  • Detecting, evaluating, and applying relevant RAI dimensions (bias, fairness, robustness explainability etc.) in AI systems; work on mitigating the identified risks. Supporting client sales conversations and proposal preparation

  • Optimizing and maintaining existing AI systems for enhanced performance and adherence to ethical standards.

  • Participating in the full AI development lifecycle, including data preparation, design, coding, testing, deployment, and support.

  • Contributing to the development of internal guidelines, best practices for responsible AI development and technical training.

  • Staying updated with current AI trends, ethical considerations, and technological advancements.

  • Assisting in the identification and correction of biases in datasets and AI models.

  • Documenting AI development processes and maintain a transparent record of decisions and methodologies used.


    • Travel may be required for this role. The amount of travel will vary from 0 to 100% depending on business need and client requirements.

    Here‚Äôs What You Need:


  • Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or related technical fields.

  • Experience in developing and deploying machine learning models and AI solutions. At least 2 from the following: Statistics and Probability Theory, Regression Modelling, Clustering Methods, Deep Learning, Neural Networks, Natural Language Processing, Text Mining, Computer Vision, Image Recognition, Time Series Forecasting, Machine Learning Visualization Tools, Tree Ensembles

  • Proficiency in programming languages like Python, R, or Java. Familiarity with AI and machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch). Experience on big data technologies and tools (e.g., Hadoop, Spark).

  • Experience with database management and data processing.

  • Understanding and working knowledge of cloud services and platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) related to AI.

  • Demonstrated ability to work with complex datasets and perform data preprocessing and analysis.

  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

  • Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and communicate effectively with team members.

  • Commitment to ethical AI development and continuous learning in the field.

  • Ability to manage multiple projects and priorities in a fast-paced environment.

  • Excellent documentation and presentation skills for technical and non-technical audiences.


    • Bonus Points If You Have:


  • Additional courses or training in areas related to responsible AI, ethics in technology, or similar fields are beneficial.

  • Certifications in AI, machine learning, or data science.

  • Prior experience in projects focused on ethical AI or AI for social good.

  • Knowledge of AI ethics, data privacy, and regulatory frameworks.

  • Experience with AI model interpretability and explainability tools. Specialized visualization techniques (D3.js, ggplot etc.)

  • Project Management Experience

  • Linguistic proficiency (to a reasonable business level) in a language other than English

Title: Analytics Engineer
Description:
At Bending Spoons, we‚Äôre striving to build one of the all-time great companies. A company that serves a huge number of customers. A company where team members grow to their full potential. A company that functions at unparalleled levels of effectiveness and efficiency. A company that creates value for shareowners at an extraordinary rate. And a company that does so while adhering to high ethical standards.




To achieve this objective, we execute the following strategy: We acquire a digital business with untapped potential and make it as successful as we can by leveraging our platform‚Äîwhich comprises our expertise, technologies, data, brand, talents, and company culture. Then, we invest the proceeds into making our platform more powerful, and into acquiring new businesses. Thus, our strategy sees us combine an investor‚Äôs attention to capital allocation with the hands-on approach of an operator.




For a talented, driven, and collaborative individual, working at Bending Spoons is an opportunity to learn, make an impact, and progress their career at an exceptionally high rate. That‚Äôs our promise to such a candidate.




A few examples of your responsibilities

Analyze and pull insights from vast amounts of data, spotting high-value opportunities to improve our decision-making.
Design, build, and maintain databases and automated data processes, leveraging internal Python libraries and Google BigQuery, with a focus on clarity, consistency, and accuracy of data across various platforms and systems.
Bring polished data to the final decision-makers, building pipelines and dashboards that offer insights into the performance of products, marketing campaigns, and more.
Collaborate closely with our engineering and data science teams to ensure data reliability, scalability, and accuracy.
Stay informed of industry trends and technologies, and actively participate in the formulation of best practices and standards.




What we look for

Reasoning ability. Given the necessary knowledge, you can solve complex problems. You think from first principles, and structure your ideas sharply. You resist the influence of biases. You identify and take care of the details that matter.
Drive. You‚Äôre extremely ambitious in everything you do‚Äîand your initiative, effort, and tenacity match the intensity of your ambition. You feel deeply responsible for your work. You hold yourself to a high‚Äîand rising‚Äîbar.
Team spirit. You give generously and without the expectation of receiving in return. You support the best idea, not your idea. You're always happy to get your hands dirty to help your team. You‚Äôre reliable, honest, and transparent.
Proficiency in English. You read, write, and speak proficiently in English.




What we offer

Incredibly talented, entrepreneurial teams. You‚Äôll work in small, result-oriented, autonomous teams alongside some of the brightest people in your field.
An exceptional opportunity for growth. We go to great lengths to hire individuals of outstanding potential‚Äîthen, our priority is to put them in the ideal position to thrive. Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you‚Äôve got what it takes, you‚Äôll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.
Competitive pay and access to equity in the company. Typically, we offer an individual at the start of their career a salary of ‚Ç¨52,246. Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.
All. These. Benefits. Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.




Commitment & contract

Permanent or fixed-term. Full-time.




Location

Milan (Italy) or fully remote.




Before you apply

Bending Spoons is a demanding environment: We‚Äôre extremely ambitious and we ask a lot of ourselves and one another. While this tends to lead to fantastic learning, achievements, and career growth, it also requires a significant commitment. So if you like the role and are ready to give your very best, don‚Äôt hesitate to apply.




The selection process

We welcome applications in English and Italian. If you pass our screening, we‚Äôll ask you to take on a few tests that assess how you approach unfamiliar problems. If you‚Äôre successful with those, we‚Äôll invite you to a series of interviews.




Bending Spoons is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We consider for employment any applicant and we provide reasonable accommodations for an applicant with disabilities, which can be requested at accommodations-ext@bendingspoons.com.




Studies suggest that women tend not to apply for a job if their CV isn‚Äôt a perfect fit. Here, talent takes precedence over experience. So if you like the role and think you could be awesome at it in time, go ahead and apply.

Title: Business Intelligence Analyst - Google
Description:
Entra nel nostro mondo.
Trasforma insieme a noi.

Business Intelligence Analyst
Quale sar√† la tua sfida?
Supporterai la delivery tecnica ed applicativa dei progetti in ambito Business Intelligence, svolgendo attivit√† di analisi e sviluppo ed utilizzando tecnologie di Data Visualization, nell‚Äôambito di progettualit√† o in modalit√† a servizio presso i nostri clienti.
Sarai coinvolto/a in attivit√† di raccolta ed analisi dei business requirement, analizzando consistenza e accuratezza dei requisiti. Analizzerai le fonti dati implementando servizi di progettazione dati con competenza e metodologia in ambito Data Modeling.
Svilupperai sistemi di analisi delle performance, report interattivi e
dashboard analitiche con tecnologie come QlikView, QlikSense, Tableau, PowerBI, SAP BO per elaborare le analisi e rappresentare i risultati, implementando le metriche pi√π efficaci al fine di costruire validi strumenti di supporto alle decisioni di business.
Tra le tue responsabilit√† potranno anche esserci l‚Äôestrazione e rappresentazione sintetica di analisi complesse realizzate da altre figure professionali (es. Data Scientist, Data Governance expert, Data Architect, Data Project Manager).
Ti sar√† richiesto, in modo commisurato alla tua seniority, di dimostrare ed evolvere le capacit√† di costruire relazioni con clienti, vendor di tecnologie, partner, assicurare il raggiungimento della migliore elaborazione dei risultati delle tue analisi comunicandoli efficacemente a colleghi e Clienti e, per finire, il coordinamento di analisti/e pi√π junior all‚Äôinterno di team articolati.
Sarai tu ad entrare nel nostro Team?
Requisiti Indispensabili:
- Laurea Specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Matematica, Ingegneria delle Telecomunicazioni, Informatica, Statistica, Ingegneria Gestionale o discipline affini (STEM)
- Esperienza pregressa in almeno una tecnologia di Data Visualization (e.g. Looker, Tableau, PowerBI, QlikSense) o in processi di estrazione, pulizia, modellazione e analisi dati, con strumenti tipici del settore (quali MS Excel, SQL, SAS e Python);
- Ottima conoscenza e competenza in ambito SQL
- Analisi funzionali in ambito dati e IT;
- Conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese
Plus:
- Capacit√† di realizzare stored procedure e SQL function
- MS Excel avanzato (VBA programming)
- SAS Base/Guide, Python, R, Java, C++, Javascript/HTML, PHP
- Esperienza in progetti che utilizzano modelli di AI (Gemini, OpenAI, altro) che servono a generare insights dei dati.
Soft Skills:
- Standing consulenziale
- Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative
- Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
- Buona attitudine a lavorare in team
- Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze
- Disponibilit√† per trasferte in Italia e all‚Äôestero
Perch√® Bip?
People at the center of our culture
Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialit√† e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.
Lavorare in BIP √® un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.
Challenge yourself
Avrai la possibilit√† di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivit√† e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l‚Äôautonomia e la capacit√† di assumerti responsabilit√† e metterti in gioco.
Unlocking your potential
Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all‚Äôavanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.
Work-life Integration
Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration
Diversity, Equity and Inclusion

Valorizziamo l‚Äôunicit√† e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutte le nostre persone abbiano pari opportunit√† di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversit√† e all‚Äôinclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrit√† e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, pi√π ampi.

Promuoviamo l‚Äôinserimento e l‚Äôintegrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette ‚Äì in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99

Next Steps
Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.
Se c‚Äô√® un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all‚Äôinterno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.
L‚Äôiter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.
L‚Äôordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.
In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunit√† future.
Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.
Su di Noi
Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l‚Äôesperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l‚Äôinnovazione e la digitalizzazione.
Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 4500 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze pi√π all‚Äôavanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.
Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualit√† su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.
Crediamo nel valore dell‚Äôeccellenza, che √® la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.

- Esperienza in progetti che utilizzano modelli di AI (Gemini, OpenAI, altro) che servono a generare insights dei dati.
Soft Skills:
- Standing consulenziale
- Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative
- Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
- Buona attitudine a lavorare in team
- Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze
- Disponibilit√† per trasferte in Italia e all‚Äôestero
Perch√® Bip?
People at the center of our culture
Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialit√† e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.
Lavorare in BIP √® un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.
Challenge yourself
Avrai la possibilit√† di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivit√† e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l‚Äôautonomia e la capacit√† di assumerti responsabilit√† e metterti in gioco.
Unlocking your potential
Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all‚Äôavanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.
Work-life Integration
Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration
Diversity, Equity and Inclusion

Valorizziamo l‚Äôunicit√† e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutte le nostre persone abbiano pari opportunit√† di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversit√† e all‚Äôinclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrit√† e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, pi√π ampi.

Promuoviamo l‚Äôinserimento e l‚Äôintegrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette ‚Äì in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99

Next Steps
Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.
Se c‚Äô√® un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all‚Äôinterno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.
L‚Äôiter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.
L‚Äôordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.
In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunit√† future.
Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.
Su di Noi
Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l‚Äôesperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l‚Äôinnovazione e la digitalizzazione.
Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 4500 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze pi√π all‚Äôavanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.
Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualit√† su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.
Crediamo nel valore dell‚Äôeccellenza, che √® la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.

Title: Data Scientist Professional
Description:
IGT (NYSE:IGT) is a global leader in gaming. We deliver entertaining and responsible gaming experiences for players across all channels and regulated segments, from Lotteries and Gaming Machines to Sports Betting and Digital. Leveraging a wealth of compelling content, substantial investment in innovation, player insights, operational expertise, and leading-edge technology, our solutions deliver unrivaled gaming experiences that engage players and drive growth. We have a well-established local presence and relationships with governments and regulators in more than 100 countries around the world, and create value by adhering to the highest standards of service, integrity, and responsibility. IGT has approximately 10,500 employees. For more information, please visit www.igt.com .

Ruolo

Job Title: Data Scientist Professional

Location: Roma

Smartworking: Possibile per questa posizione

Attivit√† Previste


Proporre soluzioni innovative in ambito analytics & AI
Progettazione e creazione di algoritmi avanzati di Machine Learning e Deep Learning, in particolare in cloud (Snowflake e Azure Machine Learning)
Progettare e implementare data pipelines per integrare dati eterogenei in un‚Äôunica piattaforma
Gestione ed analisi di grandi set di dati per l‚Äôanalisi e l‚Äôaddestramento dei modelli di Intelligenza Artificiale
Definire e implementare dashboard, report e query per rendere i dati accessibili ai fruitori della piattaforma
Manutenere la piattaforma e risolvere le eventuali criticit√†, in particolare gli algoritmi esistenti in produzione
Sviluppare rispetto alle linee guida e best practice
Collaborare con i gruppi di sviluppo per garantire l'integrazione con altri sistemi aziendali
Mantenere gli standard per la governance e la sicurezza dei dati
Formare e supportare gli utenti interni all‚Äôutilizzo della piattaforma


Requisiti


Buona conoscenza delle architetture e tecnologie moderne in ambito dati e AI, Advanced Analytics e Machine Learning
Conoscenza di integrazioni di tecnologie e prodotti SW per use case di Analytics di diversa natura (Descriptive Analysis; Streaming Analytics; Advanced Analytics o Machine Learning; Generative AI)
Conoscenza nella progettazione, sviluppo e delivery di progetti in ambito Cloud Azure (Google, AWS etc), Snowflake e Databricks etc.
Esperienza in sviluppo di web services e applicazioni containerizzate
Esperienza nella modellazione ed integrazione di dati
Capacit√† di progettare, implementare e rilasciare modelli di Machine Learning e Deep Learning
Conoscenza delle Neural Networks e dei loro campi di applicazione
Conoscenza dei Large Language Models e delle tecnologie di Generative AI
Ottima conoscenza di database relazionali, SQL e di una o pi√π tecnologie cloud come Snowflake, Databricks, etc‚Ä¶
Ottima conoscenza di almeno un linguaggio di programmazione Python e R
Conoscenza di almeno una delle tecnologie Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Impala, Elasticsearch
Conoscenza di framework come TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras
Preferibile la conoscenza di Git Flow
Esperienza di gestione autonoma di applicativi / stream progettuali
Esperienza nell‚Äôintero ciclo vita del software (plan, design, develop, test, deploy e UAT) di Big Data Platform preferibilmente in contesti DevOps
Preferibile esperienza in rendere i dati accessibili alle funzioni aziendali attraverso dashboard, report, query e altri strumenti di analisi


Esperienza Professionale/Seniority


La risorsa ideale ha almeno esperienza di 3 anni in progetti e contesti in linea con le attivit√† previste.


Titolo di Studi

Preferibile laurea in materie scientifiche: Statistica, Matematica, Fisica, Informatica ed Ingegneria Informatica

Soft Skills


Appassionato e curioso di tecnologie e innovazione
Predisposizione al problem solving
Forti capacit√† analitiche
Proattivit√† e versatilit√†
Responsabilit√†
Conoscenza dei processi aziendali
Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese
Ottime capacit√† di collaborazione tra gruppi


IGT is committed to sustaining a workforce that reflects the diversity of the global customers and communities we serve, and to creating a fair and inclusive culture that enables all our employees to feel valued, respected and engaged. IGT is an equal opportunity employer. We provide equal opportunities without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, pregnancy, marital status, national origin, citizenship, covered veteran status, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, or any other legally protected status in accordance with applicable local, state, federal laws or other laws. We thank all applicants for applying; however, only those selected to interview will be contacted.

Title: Data Analyst (ConTe International Academy)
Description:
ConTe.it √® il brand italiano del Gruppo Admiral, specializzato in servizi assicurativi semplici, digitali e convenienti.




La sua storia inizia nel 2008 a Roma, con la missione di costruire una realt√† assicurativa capace di rispondere alle esigenze degli assicurati: polizze auto a prezzi convenienti e servizio di alta qualit√†. Tutto nasce da qui, anche il nome, che vuole essere la sintesi della vicinanza, della cura e del servizio.




Da allora ConTe.it non ha smesso di crescere, arrivando a superare in Italia 1 milione di clienti e 600 dipendenti, uniti da un brand riconosciuto in tutto il Paese come campione dell'assistenza e della convenienza.




Innovazione, tecnologia e impiego avanzato e consapevole dei dati sono gli ingredienti che rendono ConTe.it una insurtech di successo con un modello organizzativo agile, flessibile e che valorizza il talento.




Chi cerchiamo?




Siamo alla ricerca di un/una brillante neolaureato/a che voglia partecipare a un progetto sfidante e che stia cercando un‚Äôopportunit√† per lasciare la propria impronta nel business.

Sarai coinvolto in un periodo di training on the job della durata di un anno, durante il quale riceverai feedback periodici attraverso un coaching dedicato.

Nel ruolo di Data Analyst, farai parte del Team Portfolio Analysis e avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† di dare un contributo all‚Äôottimizzazione della selezione del rischio e alla profittabilit√† del Gruppo Admiral.




Principali responsabilit√†




Contribuire, in qualit√† di Data Analyst, all‚Äôanalisi della struttura tariffaria per supportare la Compagnia assicurativa di riferimento nella creazione di nuovi vantaggi competitivi.
Lavorare su Project Work entrando in contatto diretto con i Senior Manager delle diverse funzioni aziendali.
Conoscere in dettaglio il business del Gruppo Admiral attraverso un affiancamento strutturato.
Acquisire competenze professionali necessarie per una brillante carriera nel business assicurativo.




Must have




Eccellenti risultati accademici preferibilmente con laurea in materie economiche, scientifiche, ingegneristiche.
Inglese fluente (sia scritto che parlato).
Disponibilit√† di lavoro a tempo pieno.
Disponibilit√† alla mobilit√† internazionale.
Potenziale di crescita verso ruoli manageriali.
Completano il profilo spirito di teamwork e orientamento agli obiettivi, spiccate doti analitiche e problem solving, creativit√†, capacit√† relazionali.




Sede di lavoro: Roma (Hybrid Model)




Che cosa troverai in ConTe.it




Entrando a far parte della famiglia ConTe.it scoprirai:




Un posto dove poter essere sempre te stesso! Siamo giovani, informali e pensiamo che diversity e inclusione siano valori fondamentali da preservare ed enfatizzare.
La ferma convinzione che le Persone siano pi√π importanti dei processi; non a caso siamo da anni nelle prime posizioni della classifica Great Place to Work¬Æ Italia.
Percorsi formativi ricchi e adeguati rispetto alle tue esigenze.
Un New Way of Working all‚Äôinsegna della flessibilit√†, in una modalit√† ibrida che coniughi smart working e il piacere di incontrarci nei nostri uffici di Roma, recentemente rinnovati.
Una serie di benefits (Sconti dedicati, programmi di welfare e wellbeing) per consentire il giusto equilibrio vita-lavoro.
Un ambiente di lavoro internazionale, grazie alla collaborazione e condivisione con i nostri colleghi della famiglia Admiral che si trovano in Spagna, Francia, UK, USA, Canada e India.

Title: Business Analyst
HTML:
For expansion and staff strengthening of the Rome office, we are looking for profiles to be included in the role of Business Analyst.

People will be placed at Clients of primary importance in the Italian healthcare sector, with the constant support of senior consultants and reference managers.

Main responsibilities:

  • Analyzing, re-engineering processes and supporting the Client in the eventual governance of the implementation of Information Systems, according to industry best practices, in order to ensure proper application coverage of business processes;
  • Collection, definition and documentation of functional requirements of IT tools and technology architectures supporting business processes;
  • Drafting and execution of organizational Change Enablement plans;
  • Project Management activities and monitoring of project progress.


What you need to apply:

  • Experience in management consulting or systems integration company of 2 to 5 years;
  • Experience in information systems implementation of at least 1 year;
  • Ability to manage relationships with different types of stakeholders;
  • Strong interest in Management Consulting, business process analysis and/or Organizational Review;
  • Good knowledge of both spoken and written English.


The profile is completed by: previous experience as an applied business analyst in the field of Healthcare (e.g., control and verification of data flows of the National Health System; analysis of processes and procedures for the compilation of flows), excellent analytical and interpersonal skills, precision, organizational autonomy and a strong orientation towards team working and achievement of results.

What HSPI offers:

  • Customized training plans, including attainment of internationally recognized certifications and ongoing learning of key industry best practices (e.g., ITIL, Prince2, COBIT, 27001);
  • Challenging work environment that fosters professional growth and career paths;
  • Team placement at leading Clients;
  • Autonomy and responsibility from the moment you join the company;
  • Direct relationship with company management and end customers.


A permanent contract is offered.

#HSPI

Title: Data Migration Analyst
Description:
What will you do with us?

You will report to Head of Tech Ops and Global Importation Manager
You will handle ETL process from PMS,HIS to our CRM SaaS
You will work with data in different formats (SQL, CSV, Excel, TXT, ecc.)
You will prepare reports to support the business with identifying opportunities and make intelligent, data driven decisions
You will work closely with our Clients in order to understand needs







Requirement

What experience and skills do you need to do a great job in this positio

Demonstrable experience in using SQL to derive actionable insights, either in commercial or academic settings
Comfortable using Excel and its multitude of functions (macros included)
Precision and attention to details
Python is a plus
Basic knowledge of HTML and most popular CMS frameworks
Good level of english




You‚Äôre a great fit for this role if you:

Have a scientific degree (economics, statistics or related field)
Are able to take a step back from the technicalities and examine them through a business lens

  • Demonstrable experience in using SQL to derive actionable insights, either in commercial or academic settings
  • Comfortable using Excel and its multitude of functions (macros included)
  • Precision and attention to details
  • Python is a plus
  • Basic knowledge of HTML and most popular CMS frameworks
  • Good level of english


You‚Äôre a great fit for this role if you:

  • Have a scientific degree (economics, statistics or related field)
  • Are able to take a step back from the technicalities and examine them through a business lens

Title: Security Engineer - Ubuntu
Description:
This is an exciting opportunity to join an industry leading software security team, and help protect the open source community and Ubuntu users from emerging threats. Canonical is building a team to provide security coverage across a wide range of different ecosystems and environments, and work to make the world a better, safer place.

As part of the Ubuntu team, you will work with the best and brightest people in technology to monitor, triage, respond to and document new and existing vulnerabilities in open source software. The role will involve collaboration with internal teams and external partners, to identify and prioritize issues and track progress.

The role can also include a number of other activities, including security assessment and code review, internal tooling developments, community engagement, security hardening and feature development and industry collaboration participation.

This job involves international travel several times a year, usually for one week and requires the ability to be productive in a globally distributed team through self-discipline and self-motivation.

What you'll do


Analyze, fix, and test vulnerabilities in Ubuntu packages
Keep track of vulnerabilities in Ubuntu releases as they are discovered, researched and fixed (using internal software tools)
Collaborate with other teams in the Ubuntu community and with upstream developers where appropriate, to exchange or develop vulnerability patches and make sure that Ubuntu includes the very best security features
Audit source code for vulnerabilities


Who you are


You have a thorough understanding of the common categories of security vulnerabilities and techniques for fixing them
You are familiar with coordinated disclosure practices
You are familiar with open source development tools and methodologies
You are skilled in one or more of C, Python, go, Rust, Java, Ruby or PHP
You have excellent logic, problem-solving, troubleshooting, and decision-making skills
You can clearly and effectively communicate with the team and Ubuntu community members


We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity we will give your application fair consideration.

Abbiamo costruito una Smile Working Company in cui la cura, l‚Äôascolto delle persone, il loro benessere e sviluppo delle competenze sono la nostra priorit√†. Abbiamo creato spazi di lavoro che favoriscono il senso di comunit√† e lo scambio costruttivo di esperienze.

Descrizione del Ruolo

Siamo alla ricerca di un Data Business Insight & Development con esperienza in almeno uno tra seguenti settori Life Sciences (Pharma), Automotive, Consumer Goods o Manufacturing .

Il/la candidato/a ideale avr√† una profonda conoscenza dei processi aziendali e di business del settore specifico, unita ad una solida esperienza nell‚Äôanalisi dati e nelle possibili soluzioni analitiche da realizzare. Ci aspettiamo che l'approccio al Cliente sia guidato da motivazione, proattivit√†, forte orientamento al risultato e capacit√† di riconoscere le necessit√† di business per proporre le soluzioni pi√π adeguate
